name: @atlaskit/pipelines-docker-image
description: Docker image used to set up the Atlaskit repo in pipelines

scripts.build-images: docker build -t $(yarn -s get-image-name) . && docker build -t atlassianlabs/atlaskit-mk-2:latest .
scripts.push-images: docker push $(yarn -s get-image-name) && docker push atlassianlabs/atlaskit-mk-2:latest

author: Luke Batchelor
